summary: Five young boys in pre-puberty are collectively attracted by a beautiful, young woman, Bernadette Jouve. She awakes in them the springs of luminous sensuality. As they are too young to love... See full summary »
cast: Gérard Blain|Bernadette Lafont|Michel François|Alain Baldy|Robert Bulle|Henri Demaegdt|Dimitri Moretti|Daniel Ricaulx
title: Los mocosos
